content: I think I'll go with the Weber Q 1200 Portable Gas Grill. I've heard great things about Weber grills, and it seems like it's a good size for a small beach gathering. Speaking of which, I'm really looking forward to enjoying the warm weather and sunshine at the beach. I remember the first time I wore shorts this year, and it was a memorable day - it felt amazing to finally ditch the long pants. Do you have any tips on how to stay cool and comfortable while spending time outdoors during the summer?
